segments.text: Excuse me . I have an appointment with Mr . Li at nine . May I come in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , come in please . I am Mr . Li . You must be My Liu , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am My Liu . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to start this interview with some questions . Why do you think you are qualified for this position ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: According to your advertisement , you want an experienced software engineer . I think my background meets the requirement of this position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then tell me something about your background .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My major was computer science when I was at college , and I am quite familiar with Visual C + + and Java language .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what do you think about the development in computers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The developments in software are going ahead very quickly and more and more problems are resolved by software . In some regions , the hardware is completely replaced by software . So I think the software industry has a great future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever designed any programs concerning network ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have designed some programs for the network with Visual C + + and I have passed the test for programmers - MUSE .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you got anything to ask me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , can you tell me what's my responsibility in this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . You would be responsible for the development of software products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . This is my advantage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Have you got any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I will contact you in a week . See you .
segments.speaker: S2
